sent.orig: Now, there are several common system architecture such as data abstraction and OO organization, layered system.
sent.trans: 目前，已有一些公用的体系结构问世，如数据抽象和面向对象组织(data abstraction and OO organization)、层次式系统(layered system)等。

sent.orig: Informal organization existence may be ignored that by formal organization among formal organization, but sometimes.
sent.trans: 非正式组织存在于正式组织中，但往往会被正式组织所忽视。

sent.orig: In organization model, the new conception of sub-organization is introduced, which makes the organization model expansibility.
sent.trans: 在组织模型中引入子组织概念，使组织模型具有可扩展性。

sent.orig: Special organization that participates in the planning of Project: including project organization and performance.
sent.trans: 从事项目策划的专门机构：包括项目的组织和实施。

sent.orig: Virtual organization model is characteristic of hospital group in terms of its organization patterns.
sent.trans: 医院集团在组织模式上呈现虚拟组织的特征。
